newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-APN sees small H2 abnormal charge.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-APN sees small H2 abnormal charge.

text.p: Australian Provincial Newsapers Ltd (APN) said on Wednesday it expects a small abnormal charge in the second half of calendar 1996, relating to the set up of new technology in its Queensland regional papers.
"I would say we would be looking at between half a million and a million (Australian dollars)," chief executive Cameron O'Reilly told a briefing to analysts and reporters in Sydney.
On Tuesday, APN reported a net profit of A$11.56 million for the six months to June 30, 1996, compared with A$10.29 million a year earlier.
